achievements.name: DOD_THROW_BACK_GREN
achievements.description: Kill an enemy by throwing back one of their team's grenades or riflegrenades

achievements.name: DOD_CONSECUTIVE_HEADSHOTS
achievements.description: Score 5 consecutive headshots in a single round without dying

achievements.name: DOD_MG_POSITION_STREAK
achievements.description: Score 8 machinegun kills from a single deployed position

achievements.name: DOD_WIN_KNIFE_FIGHT
achievements.description: Win a knife fight

achievements.name: DOD_PLAY_CUSTOM_MAPS
achievements.description: Play on 5 non-official Day of Defeat Source maps

achievements.name: DOD_KILLS_WITH_GRENADE
achievements.description: Kill 4 or more players with a single grenade, riflegrenade or bazooka shot

achievements.name: DOD_LONG_RANGE_ROCKET
achievements.description: Kill a deployed sniper or machinegunner from a distance greater than 100 feet with a rocket

achievements.name: DOD_END_ROUND_KILLS
achievements.description: In a single life, kill 4 or more players in the victory time after winning a round

achievements.name: DOD_CAP_LAST_FLAG
achievements.description: Capture the final flag to win a round

achievements.name: DOD_USE_ENEMY_WEAPONS
achievements.description: Score 5 or more kills in a single life using scavenged enemy weapons

achievements.name: DOD_KILL_DOMINATING_MG
achievements.description: Kill a machinegunner who has killed 8 or more players from a single deployed position

achievements.name: DOD_COLMAR_DEFENSE
achievements.description: Win Dod_Colmar without the other team detonating any bombs on your objectives

achievements.name: DOD_BLOCK_CAPTURES
achievements.description: Block a Flag Capture that would have won the round for the enemy team

achievements.name: DOD_JAGD_OVERTIME_CAP
achievements.description: In Dod_Jagd, plant a bomb that explodes in overtime to extend the round

achievements.name: DOD_WEAPON_MASTERY
achievements.description: In a single life, get a kill with an MG, Sniper Rifle, Rifle, SubMG and a Grenade

achievements.name: DOD_KILLS_AS_ALLIES
achievements.description: Get 5000 kills as an Allied player

achievements.name: DOD_KILLS_AS_AXIS

achievements.name: DOD_KILLS_AS_RIFLEMAN

achievements.name: DOD_KILLS_AS_MG
achievements.description: Get 1000 kills as the Machinegunner player class

achievements.name: DOD_KILLS_AS_BAZOOKAGUY
achievements.description: Get 1000 kills as the Rocket player class
